author: IGN
description:
Barron’s Cove follows a father with a violent past (Hedlund) as he grieves the sudden loss of his only child. Convinced of a cover-up and intent on obtaining answers about his son’s death, he kidnaps the troubled boy he holds responsible – the son of a prominent local politician – which ignites a media firestorm and frenzied manhunt. But as he grows ever closer to uncovering the truth, he is left to wonder whether his pursuers are really seeking to protect the boy, or merely the secrets he keeps.

#BarronsCove #Movies #IGN
title: Barron's Cove - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Gameplay Trailer for Deadly Quiet, a 4-player co-op action horror adventure game developed by Tarba Paul Cornel and Abdul Rafy. Players will struggle to survive in the Hoia Baciu forest to gather resources, weapons, and equipment to defeat the enemies amongst the team or turn on allies and align with said enemies in this asymmetrical experience. Deadly Quiet is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#DeadlyQuiet #Gaming #IGN
title: Deadly Quiet - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Meet The Rifleman' Trailer for Green Hawk Platoon, an upcoming action first and third-person shooter developed by RetroPixel Digital. Players will embody the classic army green military toys to wage all-out warfare and secure the kitchen, bedroom, or backyard. Get the rundown on the Rifleman class, a rulebook-waving, always-ready, try-hard hero. Play as the Rifleman in Green Hawn Platoon, coming soon to PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#GreenHawkPlatoon #Gaming #IGN
title: Green Hawk Platoon - Official 'Meet The Rifleman' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Craft your ultimate sword by scavenging parts in a post-apocalyptic world. Navigate an expansive open world, relying on the might of your customized blade to overcome dangerous species infected by mysterious technology. Zwaard will be available on PC.

#Zwaard #Gaming #IGN
title: Zwaard - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In RoadCraft, transporting isn’t just moving, it’s mastering. Move what matters, with the right truck for every job. Check out the latest RoadCraft trailer for this upcoming construction simulation game. RoadCraft will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S on May 20, 2025. 

In RoadCraft, take control of heavy machinery and rebuild industries in devastated regions. Experience advanced real-time physics as you manage resources, tackle challenges, and reshape the aftermath. You can also team up with up to 4 players in co-op to rebuild together.

#Roadcraft #Transporting #Gaming
title: RoadCraft - Official Transporting Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Vertical Slice 1.2 Update Trailer for Space Engineers 2, an action strategy simulation game developed by Keen Software House. Players will access new improvements and updates to Space Engineers 2 with the 1.2 Update, bringing target-based ship controls, undo/redo for the paint gun, improved visuals for partial copy/paste, and more for players to enjoy. Update 1.2 for Space Engineers 2 is available now for PC in Steam Early Access.

#SpaceEngineers2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Space Engineers 2 - Official Vertical Slice 1.2 Update Trailer
